name: firefox
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "72.0.2" %}

package:
  name: firefox
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/releases/{{ version }}/linux-x86_64/en-US/firefox-{{ version }}.tar.bz2  # [linux64]
  sha256: 9bedc544dd8ef5433ee14e38777b5807b07cfa4e886c45ef2c246be6492eaf34  # [linux64]

  fn: firefox.pkg  # [osx]
  url: https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/releases/{{ version }}/mac/en-US/Firefox%20{{ version }}.pkg  # [osx]
  sha256: 71314eb7e6aa2d3d5996b82ee7c31b2445339ebcb7e5c9eb572c7ec840a5a72e  # [osx]

  fn: firefox.msi  # [win]
  url: https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/releases/{{ version }}/win64/en-US/Firefox%20Setup%20{{ version }}.msi  # [win]
  sha256: 7ba7bacfbc057366fb4be5727cdde698da506b571fa724093d3024239ca0b363  # [win]

build:
  number: 0
  binary_relocation:
    - bin/firefox

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}

test:
  requires:
    - selenium
    - geckodriver

about:
  home: https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/releases
  license: MPL-2.0
  license_family: MOZILLA
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Firefox web browser'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - birdsarah
    - ocefpaf
    - bollwyvl
